name: War of the Root
description:
Hello to all of you!

This game was created for the Global Gam Jam (initially from 30 January to 5 February) in association with and organised by the BRASSART Grenoble school from 30 January to 1 February. Our theme was Root.

Welcome to Root's world, where everything pisses him off! He dreams of solitude... So he's calling on you to help him get rid of these strangers who are bothering him! 

Here's our little game concept where you'll play as Root, a tree which is unhappy to live surrounded by people in a castle courtyard! Your objective? Beat the crap out of everyone standing in your way!

Little message that Root wanted to give you before you start: "I am ROOOOOT!" 

Game designer : Roxane Jacquot & Elouann Giacomoni
Programmer : Elouann Giacomoni
Graphic designer & 3D modeleur : Roxane Jacquot
